pr_title: docs(samples): add create range partition table

timeline.message: docs(samples): add create range partition table

timeline.bodyText: this needs to go above import statements so that ppl know what are needed
timeline.author: stephaniewang526

timeline.bodyText: can we add a simple one-liner on what this sample does? something like "//Sample to create a range partitioned table". An example in this sample https://github.com/googleapis/java-bigquery/blob/master/samples/snippets/src/main/java/com/example/bigquery/LoadCsvFromGcs.java
timeline.author: stephaniewang526

timeline.bodyText:
We've decided to just call requireEnv method here to eliminate one other method called. please see this sample for details - 
  
    
      java-bigquery/samples/snippets/src/test/java/com/example/bigquery/LoadCsvFromGcsIT.java
    
    
         Line 39
      in
      16738be
    
    
    
    

        
          
           private static final String BIGQUERY_DATASET_NAME = requireEnvVar("BIGQUERY_DATASET_NAME");
timeline.author: stephaniewang526
